body: Well , ive been timing out alot 5 times in the last 3 minutes I lag then it said Timed Out ( Can Someone Fix This? ) Other People are timing out too!
body_tagged: Well , ive been timing out alot 5 times in the last 3 minutes I lag then it said Timed Out ( Can Someone Fix This? ) Other People are timing out too!
title: Timing Out Way Too much!

replies.body:
Timeout= nerdy for "lost connection"
Guessing by the amount pf people that are getting this error, the avicus server's are having a problem[most likely crashing].
We just have to wait for the avicus staff to fix it.....
